name: One against the wind
description:
A first-person shooter in which there are two game modes.
1. Destroy the enemy generator.
2. Steal the enemy's documents.
1. In the "Destroy the enemy generator" mode, you must approach the enemy generator (green pointer on the map) and place a bomb on it. Enemy soldiers approach your generator (red pointer on the map) and place a bomb on it.
The time of the bomb timer is one minute.
To win in this mode, you have to blow up the opponent's generator before he blows up your generator.
2. In the "Steal enemy documents" mode, you must enter the palace building and steal documents (green pointer on the map). Then leave the palace and go beyond the outer perimeter of the palace through any gate.
